item.description: GitHub Source Code Problem One (Top K Frequent Elements) Understanding the problem 1-First It’s not an empty array sow we won’t bother ourselves about (Options ,Some,Nil) 2-Second Array in Scala in Mutable indexed homogenous type of collection,so what benefits an array brings as a data structure the elements in array can be accessed randomly by using the index number.
